## Folder type

Represents the data of a Folder: an item used to organize the items in a Repository.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Folder = OrganizationalItem & {
    IsActive?: boolean;
    IsActiveResolvedValue?: boolean;
    IsLinkedSchemaMandatory?: boolean;
    LinkedSchema?: Link;
};
```
